title: Unable to create a team in the EU Beta Tournament. (Potential 3v3 problem)
body:
So I have been unable to create a team in the new Beta Tournament while being level 30+ and honor level 2+.
I am unranked in Soloq/Flex but am ranked in 3v3. When I asked on the official discord they told me being ranked in 3v3 should count like it says in the announcement (Youâ€™ve completed ranked placement matches for at least one ranked queue).
Do I lack any other requirement or am I correct and is this going to be changed before the beginning of the tournament or do I have to finish my placements in an other queue?

replies.body: Heya, you may want to send this feedback over to the devs at the [Clash Discord](https://discord.gg/CV5tpb6).  It's still currently in beta in a few regions, so we don't have a lot of visibility on it yet.
